DOC.brief_title: Study Clinical Outcomes Associated With Pulmonary Artery Catheter ( PAC ) Cardiac Surgery Patients
DOC.detailed_description: A retrospective study conduct use prospectively collect hospital inpatient data duration 5 year ( Jan. 1 , 2010 - June 30 , 2015 ) use large US electronic health database ( Cerner HealthFacts ; Kansas City , MO ) . Patients underwent qualify cardiac surgery ( verify use select valid International Classification Diseases-9 procedure code and/or Current Procedural Terminology [ CPT ] code ) include . Each patient 's cohort designation define base upon whether he/she receive pulmonary artery catheter ( PAC ) monitoring purpose . Propensity score , take account patient hospital demographic , patient comorbidities , surgical type ( isolated coronary artery bypass graft [ CABG ] , valve , aortic surgery , multi-procedures , complex nonvalvular procedure heart transplant ) , pre-operative condition ( via adapt EuroSCORE II ) utilize `` match '' patient receive PAC monitoring purpose , form match study cohort . Clinical outcome monitor index visit discharge 90 day post index visit discharge .
